document.full_text: montana governor brian schweitzer on wednesday vetoed a bill that would have repealed the state's 7-year-old, voter-approved law legalizing marijuana for medical purposes.
document.title: montana governor vetoes repeal of medical marijuana law
lines_and_colors: montana governor brian schweitzer on wednesday vetoed a bill that would have repealed the state's 7-year-old, voter-approved law legalizing marijuana for medical purposes.
